legal_framework.authority: CMUV (Conselho Municipal de Trânsito e Transporte)
legal_framework.notes: Most sophisticated and complex regulatory framework in Brazil

credenciamento.authority: CMUV - Conselho Municipal de Trânsito e Transporte
credenciamento.notes: Platform liable for driver document authenticity verification

tax_structure.notes: No municipal tax currently imposed, but could be added in future

reporting.notes: Data must be provided to municipal authorities on demand

conduapp_provisional.notes: Allows driver to work while completing full Conduapp course

driver_requirements.notes: CRITICAL BLOCKER: Conduapp course system integration required

vehicle_requirements.inspection_name: CSVAPP (Certificado de Segurança do Veículo de Aplicativo)
vehicle_requirements.inspection_suspension_note: Legal suspension occurred - VERIFY CURRENT STATUS
vehicle_requirements.notes: CRITICAL BLOCKERS: (1) SP-licensed vehicles ONLY (2) 5-year age limit strictest in Brazil (3) CSVAPP annual inspection

insurance_requirements.notes: Enhanced APP insurance with permanent certificate storage

platform_responsibilities.notes: Platform legally responsible for verifying driver document authenticity

federal_compliance.notes: All federal transportation and data protection laws apply

blockers: Conduapp course system integration with CFCs
operational_settings.notes: Fourth city - defer until platform mature. Largest market but most complex requirements.

risk_assessment.notes: SP-licensed vehicle requirement may severely limit driver pool viability. Monitor if requirement relaxed. Consider feasibility analysis before committing resources.

validation_needed.csvapp_inspection_current_status: Was legally suspended - verify if still required
validation_needed.sp_license_plate_enforcement: Verify if strictly enforced or relaxed
validation_needed.conduapp_course_integration: Contact CFCs or SMT-SP for integration options
